course.title: BA in Early Education
course.details: The overall goal of the programme is the development of professional educators for the future, who specialise in early childhood education.

course.title: Master of Business Administration
course.details: The MBA course will provide you with a strong theoretical foundation in the broader disciplines of management as well as focusing on the practical application of theory in real-world settings and cases.

course.title: MSc in Science Cloud Computing
course.details: This course will provide you with the latest knowledge and competencies required by the fastest growing global industry: the cloud.

course.title: Post Grad Diploma in Arts in HRM
course.details: Successful completion leads to Chartered Membership of the Chartered Institute of Personnel and Development (CIPD).
